author: Adam Barnett and Rei Takver
description:
Members of Parliament have rebuked a Donald Trump advisor for spreading misleading claims about the UK’s climate policies. Professor Steve Koonin, a former chief scientist at oil giant BP who has long claimed climate science is “unsettled”, appeared on GB News on Friday to declare that the UK public is being “deliberately ill-informed” about the […]

The post MPs Slam Trump Advisor for Interfering in UK Climate Debate appeared first on DeSmog.
title: MPs Slam Trump Advisor for Interfering in UK Climate Debate

author: Geoff Dembicki
description:
This article is being co-published with The Lever, an investigative newsroom. Click here to get The Lever’s free newsletter. At a recent artificial intelligence conference in Washington, D.C., Google’s president cheered on Trump’s interior secretary after he slammed Silicon Valley’s support of the so-called “climate extremist agenda” and pushed to expand the use of “incredibly clean” […]

The post Google President Praised MAGA Speech Slamming ‘Climate Extremist Agenda’ appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Google President Praised MAGA Speech Slamming ‘Climate Extremist Agenda’

author: Edward Donnelly
description:
County commissioners in Georgia may pave the way for a $17 billion “hyperscale” data center on Tuesday by adopting new planning laws shaped by industry lobbyists. If passed, the latest draft of the laws will ease requirements for “Project Sail” — a proposed data center in a rural area of Coweta County, 40 miles southwest of Atlanta — relative […]

The post Data Center Lobbyists Clear the Way for Mega-Projects in Rural Georgia appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Data Center Lobbyists Clear the Way for Mega-Projects in Rural Georgia
